usually.translation[0].definitions[0].de: used to talk about what happens on most occasions or in most situations
usually.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Women usually live longer than men.
Usually I wear black, grey, or brown.
The drive usually takes 15 or 20 minutes.
usually.translation[0].definitions[0].no: Usually can come before the verb or at the start of the sentence
Usually normally comes after ‘be’ or an auxiliary verb such as ‘do’ or ‘have’
